tool_description: Powerful HTML to PDF generation API. Generate PDFs from HTML and CSS. Most affordable prices.
name: HTML to PDF
title: HTML to PDF

api_list.name: Create an pdf from HTML and CSS
api_list.description:
Send a HTML in the request with an optional CSS parameter and get back a URL in the response which renders it as a PDF file.

PDF formats supported: `Letter`, `Legal`, `Tabloid`, `Ledger`, and `A0`-`A6`.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://html-to-pdf12.p.rapidapi.com/image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "html-to-pdf12.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://html-to-pdf12.p.rapidapi.com/image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "html-to-pdf12.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
